mapper.select: select tu.name as ownerName, ta.name as activityName, tct.next_contact_time, tc.full_name as fullName, tdv1.type_value as appellationName, tdv2.type_value as needLoadName, tdv3.type_value as intentionStateType, tp.name as productName, tdv5.type_value as sourceName, tdv4.type_value as clueState, tc.phone, tc.weixin, tc.qq, tc.age, tc.job, tc.email, tc.year_income, tc.address, tct.description from t_customer as tct left outer join t_clue as tc on tct.clue_id = tc.id left outer join t_user as tu on tc.owner_id = tu.id left outer join t_activity as ta on tc.activity_id = ta.id left outer join t_dic_value as tdv1 on tc.appellation = tdv1.id left outer join t_dic_value as tdv2 on tc.need_loan = tdv2.id left outer join t_dic_value as tdv3 on tc.intention_state = tdv3.id left outer join t_dic_value as tdv4 on tc.state = tdv4.id left outer join t_dic_value as tdv5 on tc.source = tdv5.id left outer join t_product as tp on tc.intention_product = tp.id

#{id}
